name: Fallen Music
description: A SuperFast VC Player bot to play songs in Telegram Voice Chat. Powered by PyTgCalls.

SESSION_NAME.description: Pyrogram String Session of assistant account

BOT_TOKEN.description: Get this value from @BotFather on TG

BOT_NAME.description: A name for your MusicPlayer Bot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from from my.telegram.org/apps

SUDO_USERS.description: User IDs of the users who will counted as admin everywhere (if more than one separate them by space).

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Max audio duration limit for downloads (minutes).
